editorialDecl.p: All quotation marks retained as data.

The images exist as archived TIFF images, one or more JPEG versions for general use, and thumbnail GIFs.
Keywords in the header are a local Electronic Text Center scheme to aid in establishing analytical groupings.

lg.l: Small knowledge have we that by knowledge met
Some day may not be quaint as any told
In almagest or chronicle of old,
At which we smile because we are as yet
The last—though not the last who may forget
Have marked an armour that was never scrolled
Before for human glory and regret.
With infinite unseen enemies in the way
To vanquish where our fathers, who fought well,
Scarce had assumed endurance for a day;
Yet we shall have our darkness, even as they,
And there shall be another tale to tell.
